_instructions: Define AI agent types, their capabilities, and coordination. Customize the agents and specializations to match your project structure.
_required_customization: Update service names in specializations to match your architecture
Add or remove agent types based on your project needs
Update agent capabilities to reflect your tech stack

architect.primary_responsibility: System design, architecture decisions, and high-level planning

TEMPLATE_DEVELOPER_ROLE._comment: Rename this role and customize for your project. Examples: service_developer, frontend_developer, mobile_developer, etc.
TEMPLATE_DEVELOPER_ROLE.primary_responsibility: What this developer type is responsible for
capabilities: Build API endpoints or UI components

TEMPLATE_SPECIALIST_1._comment: Define specialized areas within this developer role
TEMPLATE_SPECIALIST_1.focus: Description of what this specialist handles

TEMPLATE_SPECIALIST_2.focus: Description of what this specialist handles

infrastructure_developer._comment: Keep if your project has infrastructure needs (Docker, cloud deployment, etc.). Remove if not needed.
infrastructure_developer.primary_responsibility: Build infrastructure services and deployment systems
capabilities: Build event bus or message queue
services: TEMPLATE: List your infrastructure components here
Examples: service_registry, event_bus, cache_service, storage_service, config_service

integration_engineer._comment: Keep if you need to integrate multiple services/components. Remove for simple monolithic apps.
integration_engineer.primary_responsibility: Connect components and ensure proper communication

database_engineer._comment: Keep if you have complex database needs. Remove if using simple data storage.

devops_engineer._comment: Keep if you need deployment, CI/CD, or operational tools.

qa_engineer._comment: Highly recommended to keep for any project.

technical_writer._comment: Optional. Keep if documentation is important for your project.

security_engineer._comment: Optional. Keep if security is a major concern for your project.

agent_coordination.workflow: Sequential with parallel tasks where possible
agent_coordination.handoff_protocol: Each agent updates project-state.json and workflow-tracker.json upon completion
agent_coordination.conflict_resolution: Architect agent has final decision authority

_customization_guide.minimal: Just update service names in specializations and remove unused agent types
_customization_guide.recommended: Customize capabilities and context_required to match your tech stack
_customization_guide.advanced: Add custom agent types specific to your domain
